channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What NASA’s Historic Sun Mission Today Has To Do With 2024’s Northern Lights And Eclipse
item.description: Today, humanity achieved a historic milestone as NASA’s Parker Solar Probe got closer to the sun than any spacecraft in history.

item.title: The thought that counts
item.description: Well, maybe not. In 2024, worldwide gift card sales will pass a trillion dollars for the first time. It’s a good grift. Surveys show that the buyer sp...

item.title: The challenge of excess capacity
item.description: Marketing as we know it happened because of machines. Machines made factories dramatically more efficient, which meant that producers could no longer ...

item.title: Leading side by side
item.description: Orchestras are difficult. One reason is that we’re really good at noticing when they’re out of tune. Just a tiny bit off changes our perception of the...

item.title: Get Ready For Even More AI Video Taking Over Your Socials In 2025
item.description: Instagram is testing radical new AI video editing tools that will let you change all aspects of your videos using simple text prompts.

item.title: Majority Of Enterprises Still In The Pilot Stages Of AI, Says MIT
item.description: Enterprises further along in AI progress had financial performance well above industry average — exceeding 10 percentage points.

item.title: Looking At Groundbreaking Capabilities With OpenAI O3
item.description: Experts are talking about the use of deliberative alignment as the next advance in higher-level AI.

item.title: Apple Downgrades The Future Of Its MacBook Air
item.description: Apple may be preparing a new M4-powered MacBook Air laptop, but it will arrive months after the M4 debut and with little fanfare.

item.title: Mediocre tools

item.title: The stories we tell ourselves
item.description: If it happened to us, our memory of it is a story, our record of it with us at the center. Even if it’s on video, even if other people were there, our...
